title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7009.3 - Medical diets
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7009.3 - Medical diets

State Regulations

The chief administrative officer shall ensure that any
medical diet prescribed for a prisoner by a physician or other authorized
facility health services staff member is provided such
prisoner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7009.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
